Teach, Learn and Discover Geography With OpenStreetMap during Geography Awareness Week, Nov 15-21.

Geography Awareness Week with OpenStreetMap!

Teachers, students, community groups, map lovers, in the US and around the world, join together to celebrate geography and make maps with OpenStreetMap, the free and openly editable map of the world. Sign up for an event near you or plan your own mapathon. You can contribute to mapping projects around the world and explore the power of maps! Get in touch, we're happy to help!

Teachers, students, community groups, map lovers, in the US and around the world, join together to celebrate geography and make maps with OpenStreetMap, the free and openly editable map of the world.

Sign up for an event near you or plan your own mapathon. You can contribute to mapping projects around the world and explore the power of maps! Get in touch, we're happy to help!
